titleStmt.title: The King's Majesties letter to his Parliament, met at Edinburgh, 28 of July, 1670. With his Grace the Lord Commissioners speech to the said Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excelletn Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Letter from Charles II dated: The seventh day of July, one thousand six hundred and seventy.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
